In the first part, the reflective body of water occupies the foreground, with large rocks partially submerged on the right. Lush greenery and vibrant autumn foliage frame the pond on the left and right, while buildings rise in the background, adding an urban contrast. The camera is positioned at a height that captures the water and the skyline, emphasizing the harmony between nature and urban elements. In the second part, the camera transitions to a stone pathway leading over a small bridge, positioned in the center and foreground. The pathway is flanked by rocks and vibrant trees, with the garden extending into the background. The camera remains at a height that showcases the pathway and surrounding foliage, maintaining a focus on the garden's natural beauty.
